metadata.title: CVE-2018-18407 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer over-read was discovered in the tcpreplay-edit binaryof Tcpreplay 4.3.0 beta1, during the incremental checksum operation. Theissue gets triggered in the function csum_replace4() inincremental_checksum.h, causing a denial of service.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
